name: halifax

the capital and largest city of the Canadian province of Nova Scotia: The pilot requested an emergency landing at Halifax International Airport on Canada's east coast. Because of its large ice- free harbour, Halifax is one of Canada's main ports.
a town in northern England, in the county of West Yorkshire: During the industrial revolution, Halifax was a thriving mill town. The artist lives in Hebden Bridge near Halifax, West Yorkshire.
